name: LiveHappyDaily-HappinessBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Daily audio messages sent via your Amazon Echo device from the team behind Live Happy. We are dedicated to promoting and sharing authentic happiness, inspiring you to live a purpose-filled, healthy, and meaningful life. Hosted by Paula Felps and Deborah Heisz, each morning you'll receive a short, to-the-point message about how you can make your day better and LIVE HAPPY!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
